description: Translate a Betty Blocks GQL Introspection to a swagger to use for Remote modelling
label: Betty Blocks to Swagger

options.name: apiUrl
options.label: API url
options.info: The url of the Data API of the app you want to use

options.name: authProfile
options.label: Authentication Profile UUID
options.info: The UUID of the authentication profile used to authenticate on the Data API

options.name: email
options.label: Email address
options.info: Used to authenticate on the above mentioned

options.name: password
options.label: Password
options.info: Used to authenticate on the above mentioned
